alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 03 at 4:22PM MDT until September 03 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BOX ELDER COUNTY... At 422 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 19 miles southeast of Park Valley, or 30 miles southwest of Snowville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Curlew Junction, Locomotive Springs and Rosette. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 49 and 79. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
